title: Partners Real Estate Investment Trust Announces Distribution of $0.02083 Per Unit
text:
August 17, 2015 11:53 ET Partners Real Estate Investment Trust Announces Distribution of $0.02083 Per Unit 
BARRIE, ONTARIO--(Marketwired - Aug. 17, 2015) - Partners Real Estate Investment Trust ("Partners REIT") (TSX:PAR.UN) is pleased to announce a $0.02083 per Unit distribution for August 2015. The distribution will be paid on September 15, 2015 to unitholders of record as at August 31, 2015. Partners REIT currently has 26,563,778 Units outstanding. 
Distribution Reinvestment Plan 
Partners REIT offers a distribution reinvestment plan whereby residents of Canada may elect to have their cash distributions reinvested in additional units of Partners REIT. 
About Partners REIT 
Partners REIT is a growth-oriented real estate investment trust, which currently owns (directly or indirectly) 36 retail properties, located in British Columbia, Alberta, Manitoba, Ontario, and Quebec, aggregating approximately 2.5 million square feet of leasable space. Partners REIT focuses on expanding and managing a portfolio of retail and mixed-use community and neighbourhood shopping centres located in both primary and secondary markets across Canada.
